title: Hextech Crafting Skin disappeared
body: During Project Event, I crafted a Project Leona Skin, now that I wanted to try it out for the first time , I came to see that it seemed to have disappeared from my collection, I couldn't pick it when and it wasnt shown in the list.

replies.body: Looking at the account you are posting from, I was unfortunately unable to locate any history for Project: Leona.  The only project skin I see unlocked was for Fiora during the event.  If this is in regards to another summoner name, I'd be happy to take a look.  Otherwise, I hope that helps clear things up!
I got the same problem. My dryad soraka disappeared please give me back I have no money for buying skins and was happy to get her{{champion:16}} {{item:3070}}
